message: Let's start with a fair offer. I propose I take $60 and you take $40.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still quite fair.
I understand you want a bit more, but my offer is decreasing with inflation. Let's settle for $55 for me and $45 for you.

This is getting ridiculous. I'm losing money every round with inflation. Let's split it evenly at $50 each and be done with this.
I'm not feeling the pressure of inflation, so I'll take a bit more. 60-40 is my new offer.
